.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa363788efcdb326930e94bf85b6fcc94ef0d295f73a65425807182c1f3ffd43e","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://d94967d080279ac12eb0d253fd755ca62d71a520450406e83fb57cb3e7f4fc03","dweb:/ipfs/QmYAG1rqrRSGLh9r2EQunpX6PzREaWbfLN7JeuwtErgVJK"]}},"version":1}

claimAll(address,address,bytes).details: Claims all tokens from the pool.

params.memberAddress: The address of the member to claim for.
params.pool: The Superfluid Pool to claim from.

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the connection was successful.

params.config: The pool configuration (see PoolConfig in IGeneralDistributionAgreementV1.sol)

returns.pool: The address of the deployed Superfluid Pool
returns.success: A boolean value indicating whether the pool was created successfully.

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the disconnection was successful.

distribute(address,address,address,uint2.details: Tries to distribute `requestedAmount` amount of `token` from `from` to `pool`.

params.from: The address from which to distribute tokens.
params.requestedAmount: The amount of tokens to distribute.

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the distribution was successful.

distributeFlow(address,address,address,i.details: Tries to distribute flow at `requestedFlowRate` of `token` from `from` to `pool`.

params.from: The address from which to distribute tokens.
params.requestedFlowRate: The flow rate of tokens to distribute.

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the distribution was successful.

estimateDistributionActualAmount(address.details: Estimates the actual amount for distribution to the specified pool.

estimateFlowDistributionActualFlowRate(a.details: Estimates the actual flow rate for flow distribution to the specified pool.

getFlowDistributionFlowRate(address,addr.details: Gets the flow rate of tokens between the specified accounts.

getNetFlow(address,address).details: Gets the GDA net flow rate for the specified account.

returns._0: The gda net flow rate for the account.

getPoolAdjustmentFlowInfo(address).details: Gets the pool adjustment flow information for the specified pool.

returns._0: The pool admin, pool ID, and pool adjustment flow rate.

getPoolAdjustmentFlowRate(address).details: Gets the pool adjustment flow rate for the specified pool.

isMemberConnected(address,address).details: Checks if the specified member is connected to the pool.

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the member is connected to the pool.

isPool(address,address).details: Checks if the specified account is a pool.

returns._0: A boolean value indicating whether the account is a pool.

updateMemberUnits(address,address,uint12.details: Updates the units of a pool member.

params.memberAddress: The address of the member to update.
params.newUnits: The new units of the member.
